strings.Translation: Those Womp Jocks are the worst, always throwing their footballs and leaving their pom poms everywhere. Don't they know school is a place of learning... Probably not...

strings.Base: The Artist Collective are so dramatic and loud. They're not as bad as other groups, true, but still...
strings.Translation: The Artist Collective are so dramatic and loud. They're not as bad as other groups, true, but still...

strings.Base: Everyone knows the Cool Llamas and wants to be one of us. That's obviously why we're the best even if no one wants to admit it...
strings.Translation: Everyone knows the Cool Llamas and wants to be one of us. That's obviously why we're the best even if no one wants to admit it...

strings.Base: We're the best social group because we're inclusive and we'll talk to everybody. We're all friends, here. We hang out with everyone and don't really belong to any one group.
strings.Translation: We're the best social group because we're inclusive and we'll talk to everybody. We're all friends, here. We hang out with everyone and don't really belong to any one group.

strings.Base: Sorry, I don't think this is the right social group for you. Better ask someone else in a group more suited to you...
strings.Translation: Sorry, I don't think this is the right social group for you. Better ask someone else in a group more suited to you...

strings.Base: Of course you can join. You're just the type of Sim we'd love to have in our social group!
strings.Translation: Of course you can join. You're just the type of Sim we'd love to have in our social group!

strings.Base: We're the best because, well, we're the best at pretty much everything. We're mostly straight A students. Some would calls us brains, some would call us geeks, but we have fun playing multiplayer games online with each other so take that!
strings.Translation: We're the best because, well, we're the best at pretty much everything. We're mostly straight A students. Some would calls us brains, some would call us geeks, but we have fun playing multiplayer games online with each other so take that!

strings.Base: We're a group of artistically minded Sims who welcome those who appreciate and take seriously the creative processes. We're also pretty talented if we say so ourselves, but you should come check us out for yourself!
strings.Translation: We're a group of artistically minded Sims who welcome those who appreciate and take seriously the creative processes. We're also pretty talented if we say so ourselves, but you should come check us out for yourself!

strings.Base: The Cool Llamas are so ridiculous. They like to think they run everything and are always acting so superior as if they had any real reason to be.
strings.Translation: The Cool Llamas are so ridiculous. They like to think they run everything and are always acting so superior as if they had any real reason to be.

strings.Base: No one likes a know-it-all and that's what those Nerd Brains are. They always think they know the answer to everything just because they spend all their time in school and behind a computer!
strings.Translation: No one likes a know-it-all and that's what those Nerd Brains are. They always think they know the answer to everything just because they spend all their time in school and behind a computer!

strings.Base: Those Rebel Rousers are always breaking rules, getting into fights, and being disruptive. If everyone behave like them, there would be no civilized spaces left!
strings.Translation: Those Rebel Rousers are always breaking rules, getting into fights, and being disruptive. If everyone behave like them, there would be no civilized spaces left!

strings.Base: The Floaters think they are inclusive and welcoming, but in a way, they're just as bad as the other social groups in that they try to curry favor with everyone.
strings.Translation: The Floaters think they are inclusive and welcoming, but in a way, they're just as bad as the other social groups in that they try to curry favor with everyone.

strings.Base: We are clearly the best. We are amazing athletes, we host the best parties, and everyone loves us when we win. There's nothing to not love about being us!
strings.Translation: We are clearly the best. We are amazing athletes, we host the best parties, and everyone loves us when we win. There's nothing to not love about being us!

strings.Base: Rebel Rousers don't care and don't care who knows it. We do what we want, we don't conform to peer pressure, rules, or expectations. Join us or don't, we really could care less.
strings.Translation: Rebel Rousers don't care and don't care who knows it. We do what we want, we don't conform to peer pressure, rules, or expectations. Join us or don't, we really could care less.

strings.Base: I'd really love it if we had more food options on campus, wouldn't you?
strings.Translation: I'd really love it if we had more food options on campus, wouldn't you?

strings.Base: I'm worried about people bringing contraband in and hiding it in their lockers. Maybe everyone should just have backpacks?
strings.Translation: I'm worried about people bringing contraband in and hiding it in their lockers. Maybe everyone should just have backpacks?

strings.Base: The cafeteria doesn't even serve breakfast for us in the mornings... That's really lame, we should have more options.
strings.Translation: The cafeteria doesn't even serve breakfast for us in the mornings... That's really lame, we should have more options.

strings.Base: I watch what I eat and it'd be nice if there were some healthier options for lunch.
strings.Translation: I watch what I eat and it'd be nice if there were some healthier options for lunch.

strings.Base: We always hold prom in the gym. How about this year we go off-campus?
strings.Translation: We always hold prom in the gym. How about this year we go off-campus?

strings.Base: I haven't been able to find a club I'm interested in. It'd be great if there were more clubs and activities for me to join.
strings.Translation: I haven't been able to find a club I'm interested in. It'd be great if there were more clubs and activities for me to join.

strings.Base: Freshmen shouldn't be able to come to prom. They're just plebes. Prom should just be juniors and seniors.
strings.Translation: Freshmen shouldn't be able to come to prom. They're just plebes. Prom should just be juniors and seniors.

strings.Base: The grading curve here is terrible. Teachers should learn to be more fair. We really need changes to grading.
strings.Translation: The grading curve here is terrible. Teachers should learn to be more fair. We really need changes to grading.

strings.Base: Have you seen what some people come to school wearing? Uniforms bring some, well, uniformity to the dress code and make the focus of school on learning and not what you're wearing.
strings.Translation: Have you seen what some people come to school wearing? Uniforms bring some, well, uniformity to the dress code and make the focus of school on learning and not what you're wearing.

strings.Base: I wish there were some more vending machines for snacking between classes before and after lunch. Options just feel limited.
strings.Translation: I wish there were some more vending machines for snacking between classes before and after lunch. Options just feel limited.

strings.Base: I think we should get rid of the vending machines. They don't promote healthy eating...
strings.Translation: I think we should get rid of the vending machines. They don't promote healthy eating...

strings.Base: I heard some talk of taking prom off-campus, but I want to make sure it stays here on-campus. There's other things we could use that money for than a venue.
strings.Translation: I heard some talk of taking prom off-campus, but I want to make sure it stays here on-campus. There's other things we could use that money for than a venue.

strings.Base: It seems like the same old argument, but I think student parking spaces are a cool privelege and I love seeing what the seniors do when they decorate each year!
strings.Translation: It seems like the same old argument, but I think student parking spaces are a cool privelege and I love seeing what the seniors do when they decorate each year!

strings.Base: Student parking spaces seem like a total waste... I mean, barely anyone has a car...
strings.Translation: Student parking spaces seem like a total waste... I mean, barely anyone has a car...

strings.Base: We definitely need a new senior lounge. Have you seen it, it's terrible, the couch is practically falling apart...
strings.Translation: We definitely need a new senior lounge. Have you seen it, it's terrible, the couch is practically falling apart...

strings.Base: I hope renovating the senior lounge isn't a realpriority for the council... We have so many other concerns that have to be way more important than that!
strings.Translation: I hope renovating the senior lounge isn't a realpriority for the council... We have so many other concerns that have to be way more important than that!

strings.Base: I hate uniforms. The very nature of a uniform stifles creativity and individuality. Why would anyone honestly want that? We already have limited choices and what we chose to wear shouldn't be up for debate.

strings.Base: I know I don't say it enough, but just know, I love you!
strings.Translation: I know I don't say it enough, but just know, I love you!

strings.Base: I appreciate everything you do!
strings.Translation: I appreciate everything you do!

strings.Base: I notice how hard you work and I appreciate your efforts!
strings.Translation: I notice how hard you work and I appreciate your efforts!

strings.Base: You're special to me and I just thought you should know!
strings.Translation: You're special to me and I just thought you should know!

strings.Base: Even though we don't always get along I really admire you!
strings.Translation: Even though we don't always get along I really admire you!

strings.Base: Just wanted to let you know I was thinking of you!
strings.Translation: Just wanted to let you know I was thinking of you!

strings.Translation: Just thought you could use a little pick me up today!

strings.Base: I'm around if you ever need someone to listen!
strings.Translation: I'm around if you ever need someone to listen!

strings.Base: Sometimes you can be so inconsiderate!

strings.Base: You really need to learn to fix your attitude!

strings.Base: You can be so unfair and it really makes me upset!
